name: Mmm...Chicken (and cows etc) DEMO
description:
The year is unrecorded, dimension unknown. However, a Cyborg wants some chicken but it won't be easy. The chickens are ready, and they've got friends.

  • Simple single screen levels with fun simple gameplay mechanics.
  • Battle chickens, cows, pigs, and more across eight levels, each with unique gameplay, weapons, and challenges (This demo is one level).
  • For the artists- A game made from free art and sounds for graphics and music to promote artists (all credited in the full version).
  • Collect CDs of the games music, play bonus games, collect arcade games,  play a fruit machine for goodies (full version only - Coming Soon).
  • Memes! Cultural references! Humour (maybe).
